description: Advanced laboratory or field research program involving application of Earth Sciences and preparation of thesis report. Project will generally involve a field component, both supervised and unsupervised. Depending on the project, this component may incur additional costs to cover travel and accommodation during field work. Students commencing course in Sem 1 should enrol in ERTH6201 for sem 1 and sem 2, students commencing in Sem 2 should enrol in ERTH6202 for sem 2 and the following sem 1.
